class_notes: This is an online, synchronous course.  First-year EPI, GLEPI, EH-EPI students only.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530. The primary emphasis of this course is to gain basic knowledge and skills in designing and implementing epidemiologic studies.
prerequisites: EPI 530 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This class is for students enrolled in the EPI, GLEPI, or EH-EPI programs only.
sections: Class Nbr: 4641, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
